experience.title: Vice President of the NGO Charity Against Hunger
FullStack Developer
detail: Objective: Develop a web application aimed at improving the quality of training and enhancing employability of young Cameroonian graduates for better professional integration.
Front-end: Design and integration of responsive web interfaces with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Back-end: Development of business services in Java (secure REST APIs, user management).
Database: Creation and administration of the database with PostgreSQL.
Collaboration & Tools: Agile teamwork, code management with Bruno and Forgejo, task tracking on Forgejo.

experience.title: Odoo Developer
detail: Objective: Design, customize, and integrate ERP solutions based on Odoo to meet business needs.
Analyze internal processes (sales, purchases, HR, inventory, accounting) to adapt existing modules.
Create and modify custom modules in Python (backend) and XML/JavaScript (frontend).
Customize user interface and optimize QWeb views.
Develop REST APIs and e-commerce connectors for external service integration.
Ensure maintenance, technical support, and continuous module updates.
Collaboration & Tools: Agile teamwork, task tracking with Redmine, code management with Bitbucket.
